actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide Federal assistance to cities with high concentrations of foreign-born persons, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Gateway Cities Assistance Act of 1979 - Establishes a program of Federal grants to cities having concentrations of foreign nationals (who have resided in such city for at least six months) comprising three percent of the city's total population.

titles.title: A bill to provide Federal assistance to cities with high concentrations of foreign-born persons, and for other purposes.
